page.title: 03BARRINGTON'S POPULATION
page.content: Adults listed on the February 1985 Electoral Register are-Barrington 304, Stocklinch 112,& Puckington 74. The children under 18 number 96,20,&16 respectively.The total population is 490 adults & 105 children.A door to door survey of adults in Barrington was undertaken by children asking standardised questions.50% were interviewed.35 out of 152 said they were born in the village.A large % of the remainder were born in Somerset.62 of those interviewed were retired & many of these had come from E.Anglia,the Home Counties,Wales,the North,Ireland & Jersey.A few people had been born abroad in Malawi,India, U.States,Portugal & Russia.
